content: I recall there were some parser tests with strange syntax, but I can't find them. Can someone point me to a test that exercises a large part of the language syntax? I looked for run-pass (mentioned in the rustc guide) under https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/tree/master/src/test, but it's not there.
So they're probably under test/ui, but GitHub doesn't show all of them. That's mildly annoying.
